cast.original_title: バイオハザード：デスアイランド
cast.overview: In San Francisco, Jill Valentine is dealing with a zombie outbreak and a new T-Virus, Leon Kennedy is on the trail of a kidnapped DARPA scientist, and Claire Redfield is investigating a monstrous fish that is killing whales in the bay. Joined by Chris Redfield and Rebecca Chambers, they discover the trail of clues from their separate cases all converge on the same location, Alcatraz Island, where a new evil has taken residence and awaits their arrival.
cast.title: Resident Evil: Death Island

cast.original_title: バイオハザード ダムネーション
cast.overview: U.S. federal agent Leon S. Kennedy sneaks into the "East Slavic Republic" to verify rumors that Bio-Organic Weapons (BOWs) are being used in the country's civil war, which the U.S. and Russia are making preparations to jointly intervene in. Right after his infiltration, the U.S. government orders him to leave immediately. Determined to uncover the truth, Leon ignores the order and enters the battlefield to end the chain of tragedies caused by the BOWs.
cast.title: Resident Evil: Damnation

cast.overview: In a gritty and alternate 1985, the glory days of costumed vigilantes have been brought to a close by a government crackdown. But after one of the masked veterans is brutally murdered, an investigation into the killer is initiated. The reunited heroes set out to prevent their own destruction, but in doing so they uncover a sinister plot that puts all of humanity in grave danger.
cast.title: Watchmen

cast.overview: Batman discovers a mysterious teen-aged girl with superhuman powers and a connection to Superman. When the girl comes to the attention of Darkseid, the evil overlord of Apokolips, events take a decidedly dangerous turn.
cast.title: Superman/Batman: Apocalypse

details.biography: Salli Saffioti was born on June 11, 1976 in Oceanside, New York, USA. She is known for her work on Watchmen (2009), Biohazard Regeneration (2008) and Biohazard 4 (2005). She was previously married to Colin Mitchell.
details.name: Salli Saffioti
